channel.title: Rs2 Mapview client?
channel.description:
Ok, ive been gone for fucking ever, i got grounded, wtf ever, just recently got my computer back, and privelages (sp), and whatnot, and this new rs2 shit has me lost, ive messed with popcorns deobber and i was furious as the shittyness tbh, but are there any other deobbers that are FREELY available to the common person? mainly i ask, because i just want to deob the mapview client, tweak some shit, and whatnot, so if someone could PLEASE hook me up with a deobber, or even a deobbed mapview client, id love you forever...
And no, im not a leech, ive given to this community time and time again, all i want is a little wee bitty favor, thats all, thanks in advance.

[/quote]

Trust me, >=50 rep on moparisthebest isn’t a leecher.[/quote]All cms start with 50rep…

item.title: Rs2 Mapview client?
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Freak Teh Freak
item.description:
@Teh_Freak wrote:

OH well, lets not sweat it anymore, i fixed up a deobber, and got my mapview client deobbed, compiled, and everything i intended to do, but as a matter of fact, ive been around since the original rscn, good knows how long ago that was, i was like 12 at the time, which was a wee bit over 5 years, iirc. but yea, just lock this, if anyone wants the map, whatever, pm me.

Read full topic

item.title: Rs2 Mapview client?
item.dc:creator: @RANCID RANCID
item.description:
@RANCID wrote:

Eww, I didn’t mean to spurt some kind of ‘hp over head’ flame war. PK clients are fucking old (as Krichevskoy stated) and its just a simple like 10 line max bytecode edit regardless. That was really my first step into rs2 client editing back then, and its a good start for anyone and I would suggest it.

I suggest this thread get locked, I think everything has been resolved here. Congrats on getting ungrounded Teh Freak.

Read full topic

well I’m glad to see some maturity.

item.title: Rs2 Mapview client?
item.dc:creator: @pplsuqbawlz pplsuqbawlz
item.description:
@pplsuqbawlz wrote:

[quote=“cooper, post:29, topic:87788”]AND to you portal, that is bullshit, his tutorial was released after mine, ask anyone who has half a brain, pd or regex, even they’ll tell you his came after mine, and the reason i dont go around bragging about what i make is because, people here are not worthy at all, you’re not even important, were you even around for aryan my friend? i think not, only a few were, and guess what, not you or pplsb was there? huh, funny eh?

Uhh sorry for jumping in here… yeah i did go to kaitnieks a very long time ago… i dont remember it but then again i barely remember yesterday… but it seems to me like you are having delusions of grandeur. I’m not saying that everyone in this community is what you say “worthy”, but a lot are, and although they might not match up to your standards, they still are pretty good. But then again, from your perspective, I kinda agree, as I’ve never released any of my code (although people keep bugging me too…) but that doesn’t mean you have to treat them like shit. And honestly, from the way you are acting, i feel like im speaking to someone younger than me… like 12 or younger. You really should kinda y’know… mature up a bit. Pplsuqbawlz is probably one of my favorite people on this forum because although he is great, he still is very helpful to people who are new at this kind of stuff, while you seem to dwell on those who were around since kaitnieks being always superior. I’m not saying your bad, but… you kinda push people away from liking you.
Sorry if i got any facts wrong in this, really busy with other stuff too…
edit
lol nice ruler :P[/quote]
Fact Check: I’ve been around since 2001, under different alias’s, psycho for one, versteckten as another, o_psycho in another. If you don’t believe me, try finding a copy of my old “guild fisher script” for scar (written in scar 1.13 or something), in the top you notice, the anti randoms are by a person by the name of “o_psycho” which happends to be me, one of my older names.

To be quite honest, I posted the first tutorial ever on kaitnieks.com about “focus events” in the runescape 2 client, but since you weren’t there yet, you wouldnt know. And the only reason I did that was because Avars(sp?) asked me to. If he doesn’t recall, that’s fine he’s got MUCH more important things to tend to, but I know some of you have a stash of cache from it, try browsing through, my facts do check out.

Onto another note, there is a cheating public (here for example, rsr, sythe[although quite pitiful], fagex) and there is also a cheating underground, the same could be said for most games. Portal is a participant of the underground, as is Semaphore, both should be treated with respect. If you still choose not to, that’s your choice.

We as a community, need to stop shunning the next generation, and/or newcomers to the public arena. Especially myself, apologies teh freak, for my words. [hr]
Ty, cooper for the kind words and everyone else.

Read full topic

But then again, from your perspective, I kinda agree, as I’ve never released any of my code (although people keep bugging me too…) but that doesn’t mean you have to treat them like shit. And honestly, from the way you are acting, i feel like im speaking to someone younger than me… like 12 or younger. You really should kinda y’know… mature up a bit. Pplsuqbawlz is probably one of my favorite people on this forum because although he is great, he still is very helpful to people who are new at this kind of stuff, while you seem to dwell on those who were around since kaitnieks being always superior. item.title: Rs2 Mapview client?
item.dc:creator: @ruler ruler
item.description:
@ruler wrote:

[quote=“ruler, post:20, topic:87788”][quote author=RANCID link=topic=128587.msg1248024#msg1248024 date=1178018710]
Actually, while negative uid’s could have had a part in the bans, it was the lack of human like mouse that ultimately killed aryan. They flagged every account a week prior to the ban, which meant all mouse events were sent to the server.

Also Teh Freak, I believe I released the first pk client for rs2 back on rscn, along with a tutorial on making your own. (I’m not trying to suggest you ripped it or anything. )
[/quote]
Actually a client change ultimately killed aryan. I added in a better mouse system to my aryan derivitive.

I view this thread as… I drove a car a year ago, can i fly your airplane?

You want cheating to be sucessful? make a way for contributors to be rewarded instead of inflating someone elses ad-sense check. We have more then enough talent.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 01, 2007, 12:40:16 AM[/size][hr]edit:

0309 regecks : rulereric
0309 regecks : > u
0309 regecks : k[/quote]

DAMIT

Read full topic

item.title: Rs2 Mapview client?
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Freak Teh Freak
item.description:
@Teh_Freak wrote:

Krichevskoy:

The HP-over-head feature was discovered well before RS2. The method didn’t really change after the graphics upgrade, so no one posting a tutorial about it on kaitnieks.com was doing anything terribly new. ownt.

Then why didnt someone of your intellect do it then? and why did people have a hard time figuring it out? the questions, and yet no answers. but yea, it was easy as fuck to make, i did it in all of 5 minutes, that includes finding out how to do it, and writing the tut, and taking a piss, all in 5 minutes, as was the pk minimap, just blatantly stating, at least ive done something, unlike the other 90% of this “community”

Read full topic

item.title: Rs2 Mapview client?
item.dc:creator: @Taios Taios
item.description:
@Taios wrote:

Portal:

You say you released hp over head and pk minimap here, as a matter of fact I remember you posting those tutorials but what is even greater is that they were posted after Kaitnieks forums were removed

I’m not involved in this, i don’t agree with some things tehfreak is saying, PSB in old times was put down for never releasing things. Now however psb is releasing extremely good stuff that no one else is =p.

Portal. Tehfreak posted those tuts on kaitnieks BEFORE it died, aand i followed one of them and learnt a good few things.

So although the tut is gone, in remembrance and messing around in the client, i re-created it and the tutorial. (A good long time ago)
http://www.rs-resources.com/e107/e107_plugins/content/content.php?content.54

I think you are kinda getting mixed up with past and present lol.

Portal:

I understand where your coming from frank generally when people ask about deobbers they want to start back with editing the client. Didnt want to sound so rude but apparently I did freak but anyways … I was around far prior to aryan. I even remember when semaphore wrote a post on kaitnieks saying watch out guys a week to 2 weeks in advance, that they were monitoring and had something up their sleeves but everyone told him he was a liar because nobody knew him. Within two weeks there was a mass ban and just about every aryan user was busted (plz lets not argue this). Its unimportant what we just started an argumentative war over I just wanted to state my opinion. I say im sorry if I offended you and peace. Good luck with whatever your new goal is with rs cheating.

No…Deobs arn’t just for creating bots (with deobs). They are useful for finding out how the client works. It does not mean one is going to ‘start back with client editing’

Read full topic

item.title: Rs2 Mapview client?
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Freak Teh Freak
item.description:
@Teh_Freak wrote:

RANCID as a matter of fact, i do remember your pk client and pk minimap, but i dont remember a tutorial, which is why i made those tuts, you got me curious as to how to do them, and when i figured it out i released them, though you may have made tuts, i dont remember them, but also, again, im not calling you a liar either

item.title: Rs2 Mapview client?
item.dc:creator: @Scuba_Steve Scuba Steve
item.description:
@Scuba_Steve wrote:

If your looking for the image or data it’s in C:\WINDOWS.file_store_32\rsmap\main_file_cache.dat0, or w/e its saved

Because in “mapview.class” it shows, but I can’t open it with the same decompiler

label2: { if(m.f != null) break label0; m.b = i.a((byte)121, new h[] { Vb, f.f, h1 }); if("main_file_cache.dat0" == s1) { s2 = "worldmap.main.js5?crc=1115906189"; if(!flag1) break label2; } if("main_file_cache.dat1" == s1) { s2 = "worldmap.dungeon.js5?crc=-1610919262"; if(!flag1) break label2; } if(s1 == "main_file_cache.dat2") { s2 = "worldmap.extra.js5?crc=1653026761"; if(!flag1) break label2; } s2 = "mapview.sprites.js5?crc=-1203441070"; } if("main_file_cache.dat0" != s1) { if(s1 == "main_file_cache.dat1") { j1 = 0x24c0f; if(!flag1) break label1; } if(s1 == "main_file_cache.dat2") { j1 = 0x1e0b1; if(!flag1) break label1; } j1 = 8383; if(!flag1) break label1; } j1 = 0x65666; }

If any1 figures a way to open main_file_cache.dat0 tell me please

Read full topic

I understand where your coming from frank generally when people ask about deobbers they want to start back with editing the client. Didnt want to sound so rude but apparently I did freak but anyways … I was around far prior to aryan. I even remember when semaphore wrote a post on kaitnieks saying watch out guys a week to 2 weeks in advance, that they were monitoring and had something up their sleeves but everyone told him he was a liar because nobody knew him. semaphore said they were watching every mouse packet. He also said they were processing every packet.

he is part of the jagex fud machine.

It turns out the aryan devs made everyone have a negative uid, someone told jagex, and jagex then mass banned. Jagex then credited themselves for the detetion methods instead of the Aryan devs.

Also you guys want ppl to post the best solutions publicly, think again! The best stuff is all private.

@ portal, get a clue, when you say “deob” you are meaning both deobfuscated (the flow control removed) and decompiled. many, as in all the ones i have heard of, bot updaters use deobfuscators to make bytecode pattern matching easier
